answers.answer: Hi Mary,How are you? What diagnostic tests were done int he past? Can you elaborate on the character and frequency of the pain and how long have you been experiencing this? Do you have other medical conditions such as diabetes, vasculitis, vitamin deficiency?  If MRI was not yet done, this could help in determining the underlying cause.  If pain does not resolve with pain medications, you may need stronger prescription pain medications or try complementary and alternative medicine such as biofeedback therapy and acupuncture. Check with a neurologist also for proper evaluation. Take care and do keep us posted.
